scripts.migration:generate: npm run build && typeorm migration:generate -d dist/database.js -p src/migrations/auto
scripts.migration:run: npm run build && typeorm migration:run -d dist/database.js
scripts.migration:revert: npm run build && typeorm migration:revert -d dist/database.js
scripts.docker-build: npm run increase-package-version && docker build -t protravka-backend .
scripts.deploy: npm run docker-build && wsl --setdefault Ubuntu && bash deploy.sh
scripts.ssh-azure-container: az containerapp exec --name protravka-backend --resource-group protravka --container protravka-backend --command "/bin/sh"
